entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
